A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was hoping for another version of this episode\, for me this movie is such a mess that I don't know if this is not another frankenmovie\, is hard to wrap my mind on why they try so hard to end the Skywalker saga to move on\, I get it\, there's much more to explore and all that\, but it needs to be a decent and respectful end\, no like this.\nBeyond the Skywalker point\, the movie force humorous moments trying really hard to be funny at times where probably it doesn't fit\, bad timing is one of the main issues with this movie\, it is just a Jar Jar Binks short to be a galactic disaster.
